name: Super Mario World Deluxe
description:
Description:

Super Mario World Deluxe is a mario fan game based on Super Mario World Series. The game has a lot new things, stages, themes, which also inspired by Super Mario Maker/ Super Mario Maker 2 topic! The game was created with Open Source Mario Engine for Game Maker 8 pro, which the engine created by Gatete. The game is a platform mario game where mario trying to save princess peach from king koopa Bowser beating all levels from the worlds. Onetimes, mario will get a power-up and become strong by killing enemies and yoshi takes part in it, which also eats apples and mini enemies. The game was created by G-Rex Studio, who finally tried to make the one mario fan game.

Description: 

This is my very first finished mario game ever. I finally finished this game, but I didn't finished all from this game. This game is now a demo version and It's still in development, but the game has 44 levels and a lot stuff, so I call it *full demo game*. The next game version will come soon and It will be fully finished with better graphics and quality.
